definitions.body: usu. c. art. ´[[הָר]]: the Height, Rama, [[הָרָמָה]] (exc. Je 31:15, Ne 11:33):

in Benj., on border of Ephr., Ho 5:8, 1Ki 15:17, 1Ki 15:21, 1Ki 15:22 = 2Ch 16:1, 2Ch 16:5, 2Ch 16:6, Ju Jdg 4:5, Jdg 19:3, Is 10:29, Je 31:15, Je 40:1, Jos 18:25 (P), Ezr 2:26 = Ne 7:30, prob. also Ne 11:33; LXX usu. Rama; mod. er-Râm, 5 miles N. of Jerus., Buhl:Geogr. 172.

?), home of Samuel 1Sa 1:19, 1Sa 2:11, 1Sa 7:17, 1Sa 8:4, 1Sa 15:34, 1Sa 16:13, 1Sa 19:18, 1Sa 19:22 a (all c. [[ה]] loc., [[הָרָמָָ֫חָה]]), v:1Sa 19:19, v:1Sa 19:22 b, v:1Sa 19:23, v:1Sa 19:23, 1Sa 20:1, 1Sa 25:1, 1Sa 28:3, = [[הָרָמָתַיִם]] 1Sa 1:1 (v. [[חוּפִי]]); LXX Armaqaim, Rama; perhaps (if distinct from
) = Besit-Rima, 13 miles ENE. of Lydda (GASM:Geogr. 254 Buhl:Geogr. 170); or Râm-allah, 3 m. SW. of Bethel (Ew:Hist. ii. 421 al.) [cf. also )Arimaqama; Mt 27:57 +].
in Asher Jos 19:29 (P), Rama; perh. Râmiye, c. 12 miles E. of Ladder of Tyre Rob:BR iii. 79 Buhl:Geogr. 231.
in Naphtali, Jos 19:36 (P), Arahl, A LXXL Rama; mod. Râmeh, c. 8 miles WSW. of Safed Buhl:Geogr. 222.
[[רָמָה]]([[בּ]]) 2Ki 8:29 = 2Ch 22:6 Remmwq, Ramwq; LXXL Ramaq Gal.), v. [[רָמוֹת]]
